content: Dutch footballer (born 2004) **Jorg Schreuders** (born 9 September 2004) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays as a [midfielder](/wiki/Midfielder) for [FC Groningen](/wiki/FC_Groningen). Born in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), he represents the Netherlands at the youth level. ## Club career ### Early career Born in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), Schreuders began playing in the youth of [Be Quick 1887](/wiki/Be_Quick_1887) and joined the FC Groningen youth academy in 2015. In 2022, he signed his first professional contract with FC Groningen for two years until June 2024, with an additional year extension. At the end of 2022 he was called up for the senior team to join them in their mid-season training camp in Spain. ### FC Groningen On 15 April 2023, Schreuders made his first team debut, against [RKC Waalwijk](/wiki/RKC_Waalwijk). He started as a substitution, but he got subbed on during the second half for [Tomáš Suslov](/wiki/Tom%C3%A1%C5%A1_Suslov). Two weeks later, on his second appearance, he debuted as a starter, against [Go Ahead Eagles](/wiki/Go_Ahead_Eagles). He started as a [right-back](/wiki/Right-back), because first choice right back [Damil Dankerlui](/wiki/Damil_Dankerlui) was injured. FC Groningen drew against Go Ahead Eagles, which meant that they were officially demoted to the [Keuken Kampioen Divisie](/wiki/Keuken_Kampioen_Divisie). In March 2024 FC Groningen decided to make use of Schreuders' contract option for a further year, which meant that his contract will expire in June 2025. In the end of the [2023–24 season](/wiki/2023-24_Eerste_Divisie), FC Groningen got promoted back to the [Eredivisie](/wiki/Eredivisie) after a thrilling last match day against [Roda JC Kerkrade](/wiki/Roda_JC_Kerkrade) for a direct promotion. Schreuders scored the second goal. ## International career On October 10, 2025, Schreuders made his debut for the [Netherlands U21](/wiki/Netherlands_national_under-21_football_team) team in a 0–0 draw against [Bosnia and Herzegovina](/wiki/Bosnia_and_Herzegovina_national_under-21_football_team) in [Sarajevo](/wiki/Sarajevo). ## Career statistics *As of match played 16 March 2025*Appearances and goals by club, season and competition ClubSeasonLeagueNational cupOtherTotalDivisionAppsGoalsAppsGoalsAppsGoalsAppsGoals[FC Groningen](/wiki/FC_Groningen)2022–23[Eredivisie](/wiki/Eredivisie)50—502023–24[Eerste divisie](/wiki/Eerste_Divisie)29550—3452024–25Eredivisie23320—253Career total57570—645 ## Honours **Individual** - [Eredivisie](/wiki/Eredivisie) Talent of the Month: [August 2024](/wiki/2024%E2%80%9325_Eredivisie#Monthly_awards) - [Eredivisie](/wiki/Eredivisie) Team of the Month: [August 2024](/wiki/2024%E2%80%9325_Eredivisie#Monthly_awards) - Profile at the FC Groningen website - Jorg Schreuders at Soccerway - Jorg Schreuders at WorldFootball.net
title: Jorg Schreuders
